title: How to Get Law Runes on RuneScape if You're Not a Member

steps.title: Go into a semi-crowded area such as the bank in Varrock.
steps.content: Go into a semi-crowded area such as the bank in Varrock.

steps.title: Say:
steps.content: Say: "Buying laws for 300 gp each! (Your User-name) "

steps.title: Trade with another player who wants to.
steps.content: Trade with another player who wants to. Make sure you pay a fair price.

steps.title: Once you acquire the law runes, use them in any way you wish such as teleporting.
steps.content: Once you acquire the law runes, use them in any way you wish such as teleporting.

steps.title: Find a monster that drops law runes.
steps.content: Find a monster that drops law runes. Suggested targets are: Barbarians (level 9-17), Gunthar the brave (level 29) there are only one in Barbarians Village, Dark wizards (level 7 and 20), Hobgoblins (level 28), and Hill Giants (level 28).

steps.title: Higher levels may want to fight ice warriors (level 57).
steps.content: Higher levels may want to fight ice warriors (level 57). They are stronger, but drop law runes more frequently. About 10 per 15.

steps.title: Cockroach soldiers (level 83) in the Stronghold of Player Safety frequently drop 10-15 law runes.
steps.content: Cockroach soldiers (level 83) in the Stronghold of Player Safety frequently drop 10-15 law runes.

steps.title: Go to the monster spawn points properly equipped, with lots of food, and kill as many as you can before you run out of food.
steps.content: Go to the monster spawn points properly equipped, with lots of food, and kill as many as you can before you run out of food.

steps.title: Fighting these monsters is not recommended for players under level 35.
steps.content: Fighting these monsters is not recommended for players under level 35.

steps.title: You may also get lucky at wizards tower,wizards may drop law runes(level 9).
steps.content: You may also get lucky at wizards tower,wizards may drop law runes(level 9).

steps.title: Save up enough money for laws.
steps.content: Save up enough money for laws. There are about 240-350gp. With a High Alchemy reward, they are around 144 gp, and with Low Alchemy, they're about 96gp.

steps.title: Go to the Grand Exchange located Northeast of Varrock.
steps.content: Go to the Grand Exchange located Northeast of Varrock.

steps.title: Buy them in grand exchange and use them to train for magic.
steps.content: Buy them in grand exchange and use them to train for magic.
